context: Do you have any information about the works of Lee Unkrich?
Yes, of course. He wrote Toy Story 3 which is a great family movie and part of the Toy Story fanchise.
Great! I love the Toy Story movies! Besides Lee Unkrich, who else wrote the Toy Story 2
It was written in collaboration with several others including Pete Docter, John Lasster and Ash Brannon.
Looks like Pete Docter is also into direction. Can you please name some of movies he directed?
He directed other great family movies like Up and Monsters Inc.Are you a fan of the animation films?
You bet I love animation movies. Could you kindly let me know the genre of the film Up?
It falls into several genres; Drama, Comedy-Drama and Family.
Wow! I am going to love watching that film and who by the way has co-starred with Pete Docter in the film Up?
Ed Asner was the feature character in that movie. It's one of my favorite stories.
May I know the other movies Ed Asner has featured in?
resp: He was also in JFK and was excellent in that film.
